name: Vomit Pizza
description:
Descrption

A short walking simulator-esque game inspired by old Gamemaker games and various ZX Spectrum games. Linear and simplistic, not much gameplay except for experiencing various creatures and critters we got.

Made in a few days for Spooktober Jam 2021

Story

You are a powerful gamer sent forward by God to help Vomit Villiam reinstate Earth to its former glory when its turned upside down after satanic cult uses sacrificial pizza to turn earth into a surreal nightmare! You must reach the pizza parlor the satanic cult operates from and put a stop to their antics. Go, before humanity falls!

Controls
  • Arrow keys to Walk
  • Z to Interact (and continue to next paragraph of dialogue)
  • X to Kick
  • C to Shoot (when you have a gun)
  • ESC or P to Pause
